moves.name: Sonic Boom
moves.description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.
